eu_initiatives:
The main EU initiatives, policies and legislative files of relevance to Squire Patton Boggs cover the range of subject matters covered via our 32 practice groups and 12 industry groups.  
 
Please visit http://www.squirepattonboggs.com/services for more information.

position: Partner and Chair of the European Public Policy Practice
goals__remit:
Squire Patton Boggs is a full service global law firm with 47 offices in 20 countries. In Europe we operate via 15 offices and more than 600 legal and policy professionals. With an established reputation for dedicated client service, we provide forward-looking counsel that integrates legal, regulatory and public policy advice. 
 
Squire Patton Boggs’ European Public Policy Practice develops effective strategies to ensure that clients are heard at the right time and by the right people. Our experienced team helps clients to identify, assess and shape policies at EU or national level as well as within international bodies across Europe.  
 
For more information, please visit: http://www.squirepattonboggs.com/services/public-policy/european-public-policy
